hero.title: Boost your visibility and organic traffic with a custom SEO strategy
hero.subtitle: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
hero.description: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) is an essential lever for generating qualified and sustainable traffic to your site. At Numispark, we develop custom SEO strategies that improve your Google visibility and transform organic traffic into concrete results for your business.

items.name: Complete SEO Audit
items.description: We thoroughly analyze your site's current performance to identify improvement opportunities and technical blockages that limit your visibility.
items.conclusion: Our audits go beyond simple diagnosis to provide you with a clear and prioritized roadmap, adapted to your resources and business objectives.

items.name: Custom SEO Strategy
items.description: We develop personalized SEO strategies that align with your business objectives and industry sector.
expertise: Definition of KPIs and measurable objectives
items.conclusion: Our strategic approach combines long-term vision and quick wins for results that are both fast and sustainable.

items.name: Technical SEO Optimization
items.description: We improve your site's technical foundations to ensure optimal indexing and impeccable user experience.
expertise: Configuration of robots.txt files and sitemaps
items.conclusion: These technical optimizations constitute the essential foundation of a high-performing and sustainable SEO strategy.

items.name: SEO Content Marketing
items.description: We create strategic content that responds to your targets' search intentions while positioning your expertise.
expertise: Creation of cornerstone pages and pillar content
Title tag and meta description optimization
Natural integration of primary and secondary keywords
items.conclusion: Our content approach combines SEO relevance and real added value for your visitors and potential customers.

items.name: Netlinking & Link Building
items.description: We develop your online authority through strategies for acquiring quality and relevant backlinks.
expertise: Audit of your current backlink profile
Outreach and relationships with partner sites
items.conclusion: Our approach always prioritizes quality over quantity to build a natural and sustainable link profile.

items.name: SEO Monitoring and Reporting
items.description: We continuously analyze the effectiveness of your SEO actions and adjust the strategy based on results and algorithmic evolutions.
expertise: Monitoring of positions on strategic keywords
Tracking of conversions from SEO channel
Performance analysis by page and segment
items.conclusion: Our reports combine technical data and business impacts for a clear vision of your SEO ROI.

steps.title: Analysis & Discovery
steps.description: We begin with an in-depth analysis of your current situation and objectives. This includes a complete technical audit of your site, analysis of your sector and competition, study of your target's search intentions, identification of keyword opportunities, definition of objectives and KPIs, as well as a benchmark of sector best practices.

steps.title: Strategy Development
steps.description: We define a personalized strategy based on collected data. This phase includes selection of priority keywords, planning of technical optimizations, development of content strategy and editorial planning, site architecture improvement plan, netlinking strategy, and prioritization of high-impact actions.

steps.title: Implementation & Optimization
steps.description: We implement the actions defined in the strategy. This includes technical corrections and optimizations, content production and optimization, internal structure improvement, link building actions, on-page element optimization, as well as tracking and performance measurement setup.

steps.title: Monitoring & Analysis
steps.description: We measure results and continuously adjust the strategy. This phase includes position monitoring, traffic and conversion analysis, performance identification by page, data-based adjustments, algorithmic update monitoring, and regular transparent reporting on your visibility evolution.

steps.title: Evolution & Scale
steps.description: We evolve your strategy to amplify results. This final phase includes expansion to new keyword territories, reinforcement of performing content, scaling of effective netlinking strategies, adaptation to market evolutions, innovation and testing of new approaches, as well as SEO integration into your global marketing ecosystem.

types.name: Local SEO
points: Google My Business / Google Business Profile optimization

types.name: E-commerce SEO
points: Rich snippets and e-commerce structured data

types.name: B2B SEO
points: Targeting keywords with high purchase intent

whyUs.title: Why choose Numispark for your SEO

reasons.title: Advanced SEO Expertise
reasons.description: Our team combines technical expertise and strategic skills to effectively navigate the complex and changing natural referencing ecosystem.

reasons.title: Data-Driven Approach
reasons.description: We base every decision on concrete and measurable data, prioritizing high-impact actions that generate demonstrable ROI for your business.

reasons.title: Total Transparency
reasons.description: Our methods are 100% white hat and sustainable, with clear communication on actions taken and results obtained, without unrealistic promises.

reasons.title: Business Vision
reasons.description: We don't limit ourselves to SEO metrics but align our strategy with your concrete business objectives: leads, sales, revenue, and ROI.

reasons.title: Constant Adaptability
reasons.description: Our permanent monitoring of algorithm evolutions and best practices ensures the adaptability and sustainability of your SEO strategy.

timeline.question: How long does it take to see SEO results?
timeline.answer: The timeline depends on many factors: your site's current state, your sector's competitiveness, your domain's history, etc. Generally, first results are visible between 3 and 6 months after starting optimizations. Technical corrections can show rapid improvements, while content and netlinking strategies require more time to bear fruit. Our approach prioritizes quick wins while building a sustainable long-term strategy.

cost.question: What is the cost of an SEO service?
cost.answer: The cost entirely depends on your project's scope. Our SEO services can range from a few hundred euros for a one-time audit, up to several thousand euros for comprehensive support including strategy, technical optimizations, content creation, and netlinking. We adapt our proposals to your budget and objectives, with a transparent approach to expected results.

measureSuccess.question: How do you measure the success of an SEO strategy?
measureSuccess.answer: We define precise KPIs with you aligned with your business objectives: positioning on strategic keywords, qualified organic traffic growth, visitor to lead/customer conversion rate, visibility on high-intent queries, and ultimately ROI of the SEO investment. Our monthly reports allow you to track these metrics and the evolution of your SEO performance transparently.

algorithms.question: How do you stay updated with Google algorithm changes?
algorithms.answer: Our SEO team maintains constant monitoring of algorithmic updates via official channels, specialized communities, and monitoring tools. We regularly participate in training and conferences to stay at the forefront of best practices. Our approach favors white hat and sustainable methods that resist algorithmic evolutions, rather than risky short-term tactics.

penalty.question: My site suffered a Google penalty, can you help?
penalty.answer: Yes, we have the expertise to diagnose and resolve penalty issues, whether algorithmic or manual. Our process includes precise identification of the cause (duplicate content, toxic backlinks, technical problems, etc.), implementation of a methodical correction plan, and submission of a reconsideration request if necessary. Recovery can take time, but our methodical approach maximizes your chances of regaining visibility.

seoVsSea.question: What is the difference between SEO and SEA (Google Ads)?
seoVsSea.answer: SEO (natural referencing) aims to improve your visibility in non-paid organic results, while SEA (Search Engine Advertising) concerns paid ads. SEO is a long-term investment that generates sustainable traffic without cost per click, but requires time to show results. SEA offers immediate visibility but with ongoing cost per click. The ideal strategy often combines these two approaches in a complementary way, and we can advise you on the optimal mix.

content.question: Do you write SEO content yourselves?
content.answer: Yes, our team includes specialized SEO writers who master both the technical requirements of referencing and the art of creating engaging content for your readers. We can handle your entire content strategy, from keyword research to writing and optimization, or work in collaboration with your internal teams according to your preferences.

allIndustries.question: Does SEO work for all business sectors?
allIndustries.answer: SEO is beneficial for virtually all sectors, but strategies and expectations must be adapted to each context. Some highly competitive markets (such as finance or insurance) require larger investments and increased patience, while less contested niches can show faster results. Our expertise covers many B2B and B2C sectors, and we adapt our approach to the specifics of your market, whether it's e-commerce, professional services, SaaS, or specialized industries.

ecommerce.name: E-commerce SEO
ecommerce.content:
**SEO Strategy Development**

We conducted an in-depth SEO audit to identify key areas for improvement and developed a custom SEO strategy for this e-commerce project.

**On-Page SEO**

We optimized product content, meta tags, titles, and images to strengthen keyword relevance and improve user experience, focusing on flower-related keywords and seasonal trends.

**Technical SEO**

We resolved technical issues by integrating the site with Google Search Console, optimizing the sitemap, and adjusting the robots.txt file to improve site performance and indexability.

**Off-Page SEO**

We implemented a targeted netlinking campaign and used social media platforms to strengthen domain authority and increase online visibility, targeting local influencers and specialized floral blogs.

**Conclusion**

Through a comprehensive approach covering strategy, on-page optimization, technical improvements, and off-page actions, we saw a remarkable increase in organic traffic, demonstrating the effectiveness of a complete SEO campaign.

immobilier.name: Real Estate - SEO
immobilier.content:
**Client: Real Estate Agency in Paris**

**SEO Strategy Development**
We conducted a complete SEO audit to identify improvement areas and designed a custom strategy adapted to the Parisian real estate market.

**On-Page SEO**
Optimization of site content, meta tags, headers, and images to strengthen keyword relevance and improve user experience, aligned with client search intentions.

**Technical SEO**
Resolution of technical issues by integrating the site with Google Search Console, optimizing the sitemap, and adjusting the robots.txt file to improve site performance and indexability.

**Off-Page SEO**
Implementation of a targeted netlinking campaign and strategic use of social media to strengthen domain authority and increase the agency's online visibility.

**Results**
- **Initial state**: 0 clicks per day in organic search.
- **Result**: Significant increase to 40 clicks per day.
- **Timeline**: Results observed within a few months after strategy implementation.

**Conclusion**
Through a comprehensive and well-thought-out SEO approach—from strategy to technical, content, and netlinking—the real estate agency experienced a clear increase in organic traffic, proving the effectiveness of a well-structured SEO campaign.

SFA.name: SFA - SEO
SFA.content:
**Client Overview**
SFA is a leading football academy in France, offering high-level training programs to aspiring footballers from around the world. Focused on developing technical skills, physical fitness, and character, SFA trains complete athletes.

**Project Objectives**
The main objective was to increase the academy's online visibility, attract more promising players, and improve user engagement through optimized content and effective SEO strategies.

**Challenges and Solutions**
The academy's website suffered from non-optimized content and technical SEO gaps, resulting in low search result positions. To remedy this, I conducted in-depth keyword research, created superior quality SEO content, and optimized meta tags. I also implemented a solid internal linking strategy, improved site speed, and ensured mobile compatibility to offer a better user experience.

**Results**
The project significantly improved search engine positions, increased organic traffic, and strengthened user engagement, helping SFA reach a wider audience and increase conversion rates.
